comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of square feet of hardwood flooring produced weekly, and y be the number of square feet of vinyl planks produced weekly. Both x and y are non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x \geq 20,000",
        "y \geq 10,000",
        "x + y \geq 60,000",
        "x \leq 50,000",
        "y \leq 30,000"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize profit: Maximize Z = 2.5x + 3y"
}
